summary: LOUD KNOCK NOISE WHEN TURNING STEERING WHEEL IN SHARP TURN IN EITHER DIRECTION. DEALER REPOSITION CRADLE BOLTS WITH NO HELP. FOUND LATER AFTER FACTORY WARRANTY WAS OUT THE OUTER TIE ROD ENDS NEEDED TO BE REPLACED AND WERE OF A DIFFERENT DESIGN. THIS PART SHOULD NOT WEAR THIS QUICKLY AND COULD CAUSE FAILURE OF THE STEERING SYSTEM.   *JB
